item.title: How to add _blank or open new tab for link in markdown
item.description: There are some limitations when we’re working with markdown, one of them is adding property to our HTML tags. In this case I want to add _blank property on my tag to open a link in a new tab Hack it in javascript We don’t have control (mostly) with how our markdown will be rendered, but we can hack around it in javascript.
